Name: Cosmic Dust & Rust
About the game: Cosmic Dust & Rust is a tower defence game set in space with 2 stages of game play: The first stage is 'Ship management', where the player must upgrade the internal parts of his or her ship. You can build and upgrade turrets and defence systems. You can also undergo side missions. The second stage is the 'Action sequence', where the player takes manual control of the ship and it's main cannon and super weapon defence systems. Features: - Upgrade your ships defence systems. - Complete secondary missions for bonus aluminium and gold. - Do battle with a variety of enemy types with destructible parts. - Build and fire Super weapons. Take the fight to the enemy! - Dark star fapfap button
